text: The philosopher Toby Ord places the risk of our extinction during the twenty-first century at one in six. Should we manage to avoid a tumble off the precipice, he thinks, it will be our eraâ€™s defining achievement. https://t.co/9uUTiFZrOx

name: NewYorker
text: To escape the bubonic plague, Isaac Newton left London for the near total solitude of his family farm, where he invented calculus, created the science of motion, unravelled gravity, and more. Or so the story goes. https://t.co/y3eBDm2oNH
